revised_title: Analyzing the Nature of Certain Alkalies, Phosphorus, Sulphur, Carbonaceous Matter, and Acids: A Bakerian Lecture
tldr: In this Bakerian Lecture, Humphry Davy discusses his analytical research on various substances, including alkalies, phosphorus, sulphur, carbonaceous matter, and acids. He examines their properties and interactions, particularly focusing on the effects of potassium on these compounds. Davy also explores the potential for new compounds and the role of muriatic acid in these reactions.
